thread.title: Gary Oldman officially divorced from fourth wife
thread.title_full: Gary Oldman officially divorced from fourth wife - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Gary Oldman officially divorced from fourth wife
text:
"Harry Potter" actor Gary Oldman and his fourth wife Alexandra Edenborough's divorce has been finalised eight months after they announced their separation.
READ: Gary Oldman's sci-fi film titled 'The Space Between Us'
Los Angeles Superior Court Judge finalised their divorce according to which the 57-year-old British actor had to make the payments over the course of next four years to Edenborough, reported E! online.
She was Oldman's fourth wife following his marriage to Leslie Manville, Uma Thurman and Donya Fiorentino.
The English actor has three sons from the previous marriages and has none from Edenborough.
